alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner; Johnson; Logan; Perry; Pope; Scott; Van Buren; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 8:59AM CDT until April 05 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 AM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL LOGAN...SOUTHEASTERN JOHNSON...NORTHWESTERN PERRY... CENTRAL VAN BUREN...CONWAY...NORTHWESTERN FAULKNER...EASTERN SCOTT... YELL AND POPE COUNTIES... At 859 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Jerusalem to near Atkins to 6 miles southeast of Fourche Valley, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Morrilton... Clinton... Danville... Perryville... Dardanelle... Atkins... Pottsville... Dover... Ola... London... Oppelo... Hector... Shirley... Perry... Adona... Bethlehem... Hill Creek... Blick... Mosley... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for western and central Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for central and north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Faulkner; Johnson; Logan; Perry; Pope; Scott; Van Buren; Yell
